main_title: When the Moon was Home to Strange Creatures
hook: [excited] You won't believe thisâ€”back in 1835, the New York Sun ran a series claiming we found life on the Moon! These wild articles described bizarre lunar creatures like bat-like beavers and giant blue bipedal beings.
description: In 1835, the New York Sun claimed we found life on the Moon! Discover the wild hoax that captivated America! #MoonHoax #History #ScienceMystery
